items.text: When I was a kid,
items.speaker: Male

items.text: I thought Zootopia was this perfect place.
items.speaker: Female

items.text: Where everyone got along,
items.speaker: Male

items.text: and anyone could be anything.
items.speaker: Female

items.text: Turns out, real life is a little bit more complicated
items.speaker: Male

items.text: than a slogan on a bumper sticker.
items.speaker: Female

items.text: Real life is messy.
items.speaker: Male

items.text: We all have limitations.
items.speaker: Female

items.text: We all make mistakes.
items.speaker: Male

items.text: Which means, hey, glass half full,
items.speaker: Male

items.text: we all have a lot in common.
items.speaker: Female

items.text: And the more we try to understand one another.
items.speaker: Male

items.text: The more exceptional each of us will be.
items.speaker: Female

items.text: But we have to try.
items.speaker: Male

items.text: So no matter what type of animal you are.
items.speaker: Male

items.text: From the biggest elephant, to our Ô¨Årst fox.
items.speaker: Female

items.text: I implore you.
items.speaker: Male

items.text: Try to make the world a better place.
items.speaker: Male

items.text: Look inside yourself and recognize that change starts with you.
items.speaker: Female

items.text: It starts with me.
items.speaker: Male

items.text: It starts with all of us.
items.speaker: Female
